basic_information.scholarship_name: Carrie Cook Hill Endowed Scholarship in Theatre Education

description: This scholarship was established in 2020 in honor of Professor Carrie Cook Hill. Scholarship will be awarded to a Sophomore, Junior or Senior Theatre Arts Education major with a 3.0 GPA. Candidates are required to write a 150 word essay. Eligibility Theatre Arts Education Major Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Sophomore, Junior or Senior 150 Word Essay - "Why did you choose to be a Theatre Education major?" Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
